title: Sekai Cafe - Asakusa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Pizza, Organic, Fast food, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. One of two cafes. Aims to attract particularly vegetarians, vegans, and Muslims. Much of menu can be customized to be veg. White sugar is vegan. Staff speaks English. Free Wi-Fi. Direction: when facing Kaminarimon gate, walk along the left side of the market turn left at the first archway, you'll see a green banner with the restaurant name in English.
